title._content: [Clifton suspension bridge from the ferry, Bristol, England]  (LOC)

description._content: [Clifton suspension bridge from the ferry, Bristol, England] [between ca. 1890 and ca. 1900]. 1 photomechanical print : photochrom, color. Notes: Title from the Detroit Publishing Co., Catalogue J--foreign section, Detroit, Mich. : Detroit Publishing Company, 1905. Print no. "10109". Forms part of: Views of Views of Great Britain and Ireland, predominately England, in the Photochrom print collection. Subjects: England--Bristol. Format: Photochrom prints--Color--1890-1900. Rights Info: No known restrictions on reproduction. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Views of Great Britain and Ireland, predominately England (DLC) 2002696059 More information about the Photochrom Print Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.pgz Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsc.08047 Call Number: LOT 13415, no. 069 [item]
